Name: MediTrack
Summary: An open-source platform to manage, track, and analyze health commodity logistics.

Name: CommCare
Summary: A mobile platform that enables frontline workers to track, support, and communicate with clients using mobile phones and tablets.

Name: DHIS2
Summary: A flexible, web-based open-source information system with visualization features.

Name: OpenMRS
Summary: A collaborative open-source platform for electronic medical records in resource-constrained environments.
